content.en: Spectral analysis comparison: Researchers have compared different algorithms for estimating the spectral broadening index derived from AR and FFT spectra, finding that they provide similar results. AR-based sonograms have been found to be better than other techniques for analyzing 20 MHz pulsed Doppler data. Autoregressive spectral analysis has been shown to provide better estimation of ultrasound attenuation compared to Fourier techniques.
content.da: Spektralanalyse sammenligning: Forskere har sammenlignet forskellige algoritmer til at estimere spektral udvidelsesindeks afledt fra AR- og FFT-spektrer og fundet, at de giver lignende resultater. AR-baserede sonogrammer har vist sig at være bedre end andre teknikker til at analysere 20 MHz pulseret Doppler-data. Autoregressiv spektralanalyse har vist sig at give bedre estimater af ultralydsdæmpning sammenlignet med Fourier-teknikker.
